claims.claim: AI adoption for travel planning has grown significantly, with 50% of travelers now using AI compared to 26% two years prior
claims.quote: Artificial intelligence has become a core component of trip planning for millions of consumers in EMEA, with half of all travellers in the research (50%) saying they have used AI to plan or research a holiday - this is up from 41% last year and just 26% the year before, showing a strong rise in two years.

claims.claim: Consumer trust in AI booking platforms is growing, with 50% comfortable booking through AI platforms
claims.quote: Reinforcing the increased familiarity and trust travellers are placing in AI, half (50%) say that in future they would feel 'comfortable' booking holiday accommodation through AI platforms. Just 18% say the idea makes them 'uncomfortable'.

claims.claim: Lux-scaping trend shows strong adoption with 22% of consumers having done it in the past 12 months
claims.quote: Six in ten (59%) have previously done this, with more than one in five consumers (22%) having done it in the past 12 months – showing how travellers are trying to both indulge themselves with a moment of luxury and make their travel budgets go further.

claims.claim: Passion pursuit travel shows high engagement with 68% of travelers having done this previously and 33% doing it at least once a year
claims.quote: Almost seven in ten travellers (68%) say they have done this previously, with a third of these (33%) typically doing this at least once a year.

claims.claim: Marriott's AI search tool provides personalized rental options from a large inventory of 140,000 properties
claims.quote: Homes & Villas by Marriott Bonvoy, a luxury home rental offering, is testing an AI search tool designed to provide customers with personalized rental options from a pool of 140,000 properties.

claims.claim: AI-powered search enables natural language queries making question asking easier for customers
claims.quote: Developed in partnership with Publicis Sapient, the search tool can accept natural language queries, making question asking easier.

claims.claim: Adobe Experience Cloud enables Marriott to deliver personalized experiences across its large portfolio of 30+ brands and nearly 8,800 properties
claims.quote: Help the company match individuals with the best options across its portfolio of more than 30 brands and nearly 8,800 properties

claims.claim: Personalization helps build guest loyalty, support direct bookings and loyalty expansion
claims.quote: Adobe solutions help Marriott build guest loyalty over time, support direct bookings and loyalty expansion, and help guests receive a high-touch experience on property.

claims.claim: Marriott can deliver highly personalized moments at scale throughout the entire customer journey
claims.quote: The Adobe Experience Cloud is helping our teams across the globe to deliver highly personalized moments at scale throughout the entire journey and across touchpoints, including Marriott's award-winning Marriott Bonvoy App
